Text:
When I try to download part 2 it comes up with the message: "Error: There is not enough space on the disk setLength fails".

What does this mean? I was able to download part 1 successfully, and I'm actually half way through watching it! Some great footage, to say the least. I would appreciate any help you can give me as to why part 2 is not downloading and coming up with that messsage. Thankyou!
